body:
Since I'm now a staff member on OCN, I partly represent it as a server. What happened here was uncalled for, and none of the staff from it have anything to do with what has happened. I give my sincerest apologies for anyone that witnessed, and was negatively affected by it, as a representative of both Avicus, and Overcast. 

I have to make this a little fast, since I'm pressed for time, but if it continues, you will be punished here, and it may come back to you on Overcast. I can't confirm the latter, but it's a possibility. Again, I do apologize. It was an unexpected event, that I, nor any of the other OCN staff, took part in in any way.
body_tagged:

I give my sincerest apologies for anyone that witnessed, and was negatively affected by it, as a representative of both Avicus, and Overcast. 

I have to make this a little fast, since I'm pressed for time, but if it continues, you will be punished here, and it may come back to you on Overcast. I can't confirm the latter, but it's a possibility. Again, I do apologize. It was an unexpected event, that I, nor any of the other OCN staff, took part in in any way.
title: Regarding the recent Forum Attack

replies.body:
Some guy by the name of RaZrXViciado claimed to have hacked the Pentagon, Now having an MC account going for large servers as OCN. He created so called "IFickDuck" which is a trojan horse, that spread throughout avicus and now infecting All other servers including Mojang's Login, Uptime etc. servers. 

His code he used:                                  (He used "GodZilla.exeCreator")

@Over

jk...

Some guy posted on forums something random :P
